fragment.text: GIT_DIRTY:=$(shell if $(GIT) diff-index --quiet HEAD --; then echo -n "NO"; else echo "YES"; fi)
KIT_MODULES?=nix git aws pulumi podman secrets javascript
LOG_FILTER_DEFAULT=message action tip warning error product
aws-credentials--%: aws-validate--% ## Outputs the AWS credentials for the given environment
aws-env--%: aws-validate--% ## Shows the default AWS environment for the given rule@environment
aws-identity--%: ## Configures AWS SSO for the given profile
aws-sso-auth--%: ## Configures AWS SSO for the given ROLE@ACCOUNT
aws-validate--%: ## Validates that AWS variable are defined for the given rule
check-podman: $(call task-file,check-podman) ## Ensures that podman is installed
check-pulumi-stack--%: ## Checks the existence of a Pulumi stack for the given environment.
clean: ## Cleans any file that is registered in CLEAN_ALL
clean-images: ## Cleans any file that is registered in CLEAN_ALL
clean-package: ## Cleans any file that is registered in CLEAN_ALL
clean-runtime-key: ## Cleans the runtime key and its secrets
fresh--%: ## Creates a clone of the current repository and makes the given command
help: _welcome ## Displays a description of the different Makefile rules
help-%: ## Displays help on a specific topic
host-manifest: prep ## Lists packages installed on the host
lint: lint-sh lint-python lint-sh lint-jsx lint-js
list-functions: ## Displays the list of functions defined
list-rules: ## Displays the list of main rules available in the build system
list-variables: ## Displays the list of variables defined
live-%: ## Runs the given target as changes happen
nix-flake-prep: $(NIX_FLAKE_ALL) ## Setup the Nix flake environment
package-info: ## Shows information about the current package configuration
package-secrets: $(DIST_SECRETS_PATH) ## Creates the secrets archive package
podman-clean: podman-clean-tmp check-podman ## Cleans ALL podman images and containers
pulumi-info: ## Shows the current configuration for pulumi
pulumi-shell--%: ## Starts a shell ready to be used
pulumi-stacks: ## Lists the pulumi stacks available
